DOC.brief_summary: Study determine effectiveness PresVIEW Scleral Implant improve near vision patient require reading glass
DOC.brief_title: Trial PresView Implant Improvement Near Vision Presbyopic Patients
DOC.criteria: Age 45 old commencement study Best Corrected Distance Visual Acuity .80 ( 20/25 ) good Patients must alert , mentally competent , able comply clinical study requirement Any previous eye surgery include cataract , LASIK ( laser situ keratomileusis ) , eye muscle surgery Any chronic systemic disease diabetes , heart disease , Lupus , etc . Any eye diseases eye inflammation , infection , cataract , retinal disease
